title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Pre-requisites: EC31001 Ray and wave optics; Coherence; Diffraction; Interference; Fourier Optical processing; Optical wave guides; Gratings; Etalons, Optical filters, Acoustooptic filters, Optical switching; Optical MEMS; Optical multiplexers/ demultiplexers, Optical cross connects; Optical modulators; Wavelength conversion, Optical phase-locked loop; Optical correlators, Spatial filtering; Nonlinear optical loop mirror and applications, planar lightwave circuits and applications.
